1370: Hubrecht was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Got married to Ermegardis at age 25 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Ermegardis, Alem, at age 26.
1372: Had a son with Ermegardis, Tielen, at age 27.
1374: Had a son with Ermegardis, Franco, at age 29.
1375: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Cofte, at age 30.
1376: Lost son Alem when Alem was 6 years old.
1378: Had a son with Ermegardis, Anthonius, at age 33.
1382: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Reynildis, at age 37.
Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 8 years old.
1383: Lost son Tielen when Tielen was 12 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
